metadata.title: CVE-2022-1726 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Bootstrap Tables XSS vulnerability with Table Export plug-in whenexportOptions: htmlContent is true in GitHub repositorywenzhixin/bootstrap-table prior to 1.20.2. Disclosing session cookies,disclosing secure session data, exfiltrating data to third-parties.

criterions.comment: netdata package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
